title: LFP fellow bronze/silver scrubs! x3
body:
I play mid as {{champion:55}} 
I'd say how pro I am but if you look me up you'll see terrible stats as Kat is always banned and I never get to play her ;3
So instead I'll just show you them, put Skype and ign below of interested? You can be bronze/silver IDC,

Name
Rank
Skype
